message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm looking to get closer to $130. Would you be willing to pay $125?

Hi Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $120. Would you be willing to meet me at $122.50? I'm willing to compromise, but I want to make sure we're both happy with the price.
